attributes.action: Processed Food Industry Science Initiative Salt Fat Sugar
attributes.additional_details:
Work with the processed food industry using a science based approach towards all current processed food and drink products.

Inspect all current processed food and drink products in the UK and test each product for all salt fat and sugar content.

Work with the industry and involve leading food and nutrional scientists who have no ties or involvement with the processed food industry to produce new healthier food and drink products that are less addictive and less harmful to the UK population.
